rooms.name: Forest Clearing
rooms.description: Moonlight spills into a small clearing. The trees press in close, and the air smells like damp earth.

rooms.name: Shadow Trees
rooms.description: Tall trunks blot out the sky. Every step snaps a twig too loud. The clearing is south.

rooms.name: Soggy Path
rooms.description: Mud clings to your boots. Somewhere ahead, water roars like it never sleeps. The clearing is north.

rooms.name: Stone Foothills
rooms.description: Loose rock slides underfoot. The forest thins, replaced by cold stone and a rising wind. The clearing is west.

rooms.name: Fallen Pines
rooms.description: Old pines lie snapped and piled like bones. The clearing is east.

rooms.name: Deep Woods
rooms.description: The forest grows quieter here. Even the insects seem to hold their breath. Fallen Pines are east.

rooms.name: Fog Hollow
rooms.description: A low hollow filled with drifting fog. You can’t see your feet clearly. Deep Woods are east.

rooms.name: Sinkhole Edge
rooms.description: The ground collapses into a black sinkhole. Cold air rises from below. Fog Hollow is east.

rooms.name: Bramble Wall
rooms.description: A wall of brambles and thorned vines blocks the way. You’d get shredded without something to cut through.

requires.message: The brambles tear at you. You need a machete to cut through.

rooms.name: Rushing River
rooms.description: A river roars past, black and fast. The current would drag you under in seconds.

requires.message: The river is too violent to cross. You need a raft.

rooms.name: Black Cliffline
rooms.description: A sheer wall of dark rock rises ahead. Handholds are scarce. One slip and you’re done.

requires.message: You can’t climb this safely. You need climbing gear.

rooms.name: Old Ruins
rooms.description: Stone blocks sink into the earth like broken teeth. The air feels colder here. Bramble Wall is south.

rooms.name: Far Bank
rooms.description: Across the river, the forest looks older. The trees lean inward like they’re listening. Rushing River is north.

rooms.name: High Pass
rooms.description: Wind howls through a narrow pass. The world below looks far away. Black Cliffline is west.
